title: WTB:T206 Cy Young and/or Mathewson Portrait SGC 10-30
author: lug-nut

posts.post_title: WTB:T206 Cy Young and/or Mathewson Portrait SGC 10-30
posts.post_content: Looking for decent lower graded portrait of either or both of these cards. No PSA, no writing, no high premium backs preferred, will consider minimum paperloss. LMK I have cash if anyone accepts that stuff anymore. Please send scans with price via email

[quote name="lug-nut" post=1217533]Looking for decent lower graded portrait of either or both of these cards. No PSA, no writing, no high premium backs preferred, will consider minimum paperloss. LMK I have cash if anyone accepts that stuff anymore. Please send scans with price via email[/QUOTE]

No PayPal?  Check out the card I just posted.  :)
Found a Young...still looking for a Matty... and i am watching the one in the sterling auction, thanks for the heads up on that.
